volumeInfo.description: For undergraduate courses in Service Marketing and Management. This book presents an integrated approach to the study of services that places marketing issues within a broader general management context and shows how service organizations differ in many important respects from manufacturing businesses. The text includes a strong managerial orientation and strategic focus, uses an organizing framework, has extensive research citations, links theory to practice, and includes 9 cases. *NEW- Concept of integrated service management.
